abstract: The latest recall, which covers the 2005 through 2008 Corolla sedan and Matrix hatchback, is the 15th this year for Toyota.
snippet: The latest recall, which covers the 2005 through 2008 Corolla sedan and Matrix hatchback, is the 15th this year for Toyota.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT  Toyota Motor, the Japanese automaker, said Thursday that it would recall 1.13 million compact cars, days after federal safety regulators upgraded an investigation into numerous complaints about the cars stalling.

headline.main: Toyota Recalls 1.1 Million Cars for Engine Problem
headline.print_headline: 1.1 Million Toyotas Recalled To Correct Engine Problems
